name: Farid Ajani
story: Majeed is a seasoned soldier with over 15 years of experience in the Iranian Army. He has served in various conflicts, including the Iran-Iraq war, and has been trained in both conventional and unconventional warfare. Majeed is known for his cool-headedness and confidence in high-pressure situations, which makes him an asset to his team. He is married to his childhood sweetheart, and they have three children together. During his downtime, Majeed enjoys reading historical books and spending time with his family.
